mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM xzdev.t_sys_dic d LEFT JOIN t_sys_dic_category c ON d.category_id = c.id WHERE c.dic_key = #{dicKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.sort_no

SELECT a.*,b.dic_key CategoryDirKey,b.dic_value CategoryDirValue from t_sys_dic a inner join t_sys_dic_category b on a.category_id = b.id where a.is_enable =1 and b.is_enable = 1
(a.dic_key like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or a.dic_value like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or b.dic_key like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or b.dic_value like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%'))
order by tsd.sort_no desc
